inputFolder.description: The local path to the Folder Containing the Alembic Models

outputFolder.description: The local path to the Folder where the rendered images are placed

operations.description: The Render-operations that are to be done with the files

RenderOperation.description: A Render operation consisting of the Render details and the amount of pictures to render

simulationSpeed.description: The speed at which the simulation is run. A higher speed can lead to inaccurate physics simulation but will result in faster renders.

simulationTime.description: The Time that the physics Simulation will run for. This time does not need to be adjusted when the simulation speed is changed. This time is always assumes a Simulation speed of 1 and is adjusted internally. A Negative value means the Object is snapped to the ground and rendered immediately

amount.description: The amount of images that are to be rendered with these settings

rotationType.description: The type of Rotation that is needed. The Options are Random,Initial, Custom, Computed.
